adrFormatAddress: 10 South St, New York, NY 10004-1921, USA

originalText.text: I have followed Samantha from her previous location because of her knowledge, expertise, and diligence. What dermatologists couldn’t solve, Samantha did. Her treatments address every single last pore and will leave you glowing. In the weeks following a trip to Samantha, my friends always comment how great my skin looks! I’ve brought friends to her and now they are just as hooked as I am. Best facial in NYC!

text.text: I have followed Samantha from her previous location because of her knowledge, expertise, and diligence. What dermatologists couldn’t solve, Samantha did. I’ve brought friends to her and now they are just as hooked as I am. Best facial in NYC!

originalText.text: Samantha is the most knowledgeable and thorough aesthetician I’ve had the pleasure of meeting. My first appointment with her, she explained everything in detail and recommended a new routine and I’ve never looked back. I’ve gotten so many compliments on the improvement in my skin, and I owe it all to her and her expertise!

text.text: Samantha is the most knowledgeable and thorough aesthetician I’ve had the pleasure of meeting. My first appointment with her, she explained everything in detail and recommended a new routine and I’ve never looked back. I’ve gotten so many compliments on the improvement in my skin, and I owe it all to her and her expertise!

originalText.text: Samantha is one of the only people I trust for a consultative and holistic facial that takes into account your current concerns as well as your overall skin/health history. Each facial is super personalized based on what your skin needs that day, and isn't just running through a checklist of generic steps like I've experienced elsewhere. The perfect combination of gentle and thorough!

originalText.text: Samantha is the best esthetician! She gives you amazing advice on how to maintain your skin and a healthy lifestyle. She’s super upbeat and such a great person to be around. The entire spa is so welcoming and lovely. Samantha brings such great energy! 10 out of 10!!

text.text: Samantha is the best esthetician! She gives you amazing advice on how to maintain your skin and a healthy lifestyle. She’s super upbeat and such a great person to be around. The entire spa is so welcoming and lovely. Samantha brings such great energy! 10 out of 10!!

originalText.text: I'm so grateful to have found Samantha - she's an incredibly knowledgeable and caring aesthetician. She always knows exactly what my skin needs and it's clear she's invested in making her patients feel more confident. I first started seeing her in preparation for my wedding and she helped me make sure I felt/looked my best for the big day!
